text: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمْ أُجُورَهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: But as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, He will give them in full their rewards, and Allah does not like the wrongdoers.
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan amalan-amalan yang saleh, maka Allah akan memberikan kepada mereka dengan sempurna pahala amalan-amalan mereka; dan Allah tidak menyukai orang-orang yang zalim.
